nodes.text: The Culroon Minstrel was a Jesoni-class liner operating in the area of activity of Dharus, a Rebel privateer, circa 0 BBY.

The bounty hunter Zardra, wanting to capture Dharus for a reward, boarded the Minstrel and hoped the pirate would attack the ship. Although Dharus had intelligence about the Galactic Empire provided by his contacts, he was unaware of the independent bounty hunter who looked like an Imperial aristocrat. Dharus attacked the Minstrel, boarded it, and was captured by Zardra.
